title: 2017 College Football Playoff National Championship
summary: The 2017 College Football Playoff National Championship was a bowl game that was used to determine a national champion of college football in the NCAA Division I Football Bowl Subdivision for the 2016 season. The game was played at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida, on January 9, 2017. It was the culminating game of the 2016â€“17 bowl season. This was the 3rd year of the playoff era in College Football. [2]
